attributes.action: COST OF WATER BILLS FOR SINGLE PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details:
I AM A SINGLE INDIVIDUAL LIVING IN A TWO BEDROOM PROPERTY. MY WATER RATES WERE UNTIL RECENTLY BASED ON THE RATEABLE VALUE OF THE PROPERTY (IE. LIVED IN BY TWO PEOPLE).
AFTER HAVING A WATER METER INSTALLED RECENTLY , I HAVE DISCOVERED THAT I HAVE BEEN OVERPAYING BY 120% FOR THE COST OF THE WATER I HAVE USE FOR THE LAST 22 YEARS AS AGAINST THAT THAT I WOULD HAVE PAID HAD I BEEN MEETERED! !!!
I WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO TAKE ACTION TO MAKE SURE THAT ANY RESIDENT PAYS FOR THE WATER HE OR SHE USES AND THEIR BILLS ARE NOT BASED ON SOME ANTIQUATED SYSTEM !!
